snippet.title: BioShock
snippet.description: BioShock Infinite, developed by Irrational Games, won over 75 editorial awards at E3 2011, including the Game Critics Awards' Best of Show.

snippet.title: BioShock Infinite PS3 Release Date Announced – PlayStation.Blog
snippet.description: Greetings PlayStation Nation! Today, the team at Irrational Games is proud to announce that BioShock Infinite will be released on PS3 this October 16th, 2012.

snippet.title: BioShock Infinite for PC Reviews - Metacritic
snippet.description: With the release of BioShock Infinite, developer Irrational has delivered a bigger story, more polished experience, and created two similar-yet-separate games that can co-exist and remain equal in quality.
